text.ascii: mArkaNDeya uvAca
text.ur: mārkaṇḍeya uvāca

text.ascii: tAv ubhau patitau dRSTvA bhrAtarAv amitaujasau
text.ur: tāv ubhau patitau dr̥ṣṭvā bhrātarāv amitaujasau

text.ascii: babandha rAvaNir bhUyaH zarair dattavarais tadA
text.ur: babandha rāvaṇir bhūyaḥ śarair dattavarais tadā

text.ascii: tau vIrau zarajAlena baddhAv indrajitA raNe
text.ur: tau vīrau śarajālena baddhāv indrajitā raṇe

text.ascii: rejatuH puruSavyAghrau zakuntAv iva paJjare
text.ur: rejatuḥ puruṣavyāghrau śakuntāv iva pañjare

text.ascii: tau dRSTvA patitau bhUmau zatazaH sAyakaiz citau
text.ud: तौ दृष्ट्वा पतितौ भूमौ शतशः सायकैश्चितौ
text.ur: tau dr̥ṣṭvā patitau bhūmau śataśaḥ sāyakaiś citau

text.ascii: sugrIvaH kapibhiH sArdhaM parivArya tataH sthitaH
text.ud: सुग्रीवः कपिभिः सार्धं परिवार्य ततः स्थितः
text.ur: sugrīvaḥ kapibhiḥ sārdhaṁ parivārya tataḥ sthitaḥ

text.ascii: suSeNamaindadvividaiH kumudenAGgadena ca
text.ur: suṣeṇamaindadvividaiḥ kumudenāṅgadena ca

text.ascii: hanUmannIlatAraiz ca nalena ca kapIzvaraH
text.ur: hanūmannīlatāraiś ca nalena ca kapīśvaraḥ

text.ascii: tatas taM dezam Agamya kRtakarmA vibhISaNaH
text.ur: tatas taṁ deśam āgamya kr̥takarmā vibhīṣaṇaḥ

text.ascii: bodhayAm Asa tau vIrau prajJAstreNa prabodhitau
text.ur: bodhayām āsa tau vīrau prajñāstreṇa prabodhitau

text.ascii: vizalyau cApi sugrIvaH kSaNenobhau cakAra tau
text.ud: विशल्यौ चापि सुग्रीवः क्षणेनोभौ चकार तौ
text.ur: viśalyau cāpi sugrīvaḥ kṣaṇenobhau cakāra tau

text.ascii: vizalyayA mahauSadhyA divyamantraprayuktayA
text.ur: viśalyayā mahauṣadhyā divyamantraprayuktayā

text.ascii: tau labdhasaMjJau nRvarau vizalyAv udatiSThatAm
text.ur: tau labdhasaṁjñau nr̥varau viśalyāv udatiṣṭhatām

text.ascii: gatatandrIklamau cAstAM kSaNenobhau mahArathau
text.ur: gatatandrīklamau cāstāṁ kṣaṇenobhau mahārathau

text.ascii: tato vibhISaNaH pArtha rAmam ikSvAkunandanam
text.ur: tato vibhīṣaṇaḥ pārtha rāmam ikṣvākunandanam

text.ascii: uvAca vijvaraM dRSTvA kRtAJjalir idaM vacaH
text.ur: uvāca vijvaraṁ dr̥ṣṭvā kr̥tāñjalir idaṁ vacaḥ

text.ascii: ayam ambho gRhItvA tu rAjarAjasya zAsanAt
text.ur: ayam ambho gr̥hītvā tu rājarājasya śāsanāt

text.ascii: guhyako 'bhyAgataH zvetAt tvatsakAzam ariMdama
text.ur: guhyako ’bhyāgataḥ śvetāt tvatsakāśam ariṁdama

text.ascii: idam ambhaH kuberas te mahArAjaH prayacchati
text.ur: idam ambhaḥ kuberas te mahārājaḥ prayacchati

text.ascii: antarhitAnAM bhUtAnAM darzanArthaM paraMtapa
text.ur: antarhitānāṁ bhūtānāṁ darśanārthaṁ paraṁtapa

text.ascii: anena spRSTanayano bhUtAny antarhitAny uta
text.ur: anena spr̥ṣṭanayano bhūtāny antarhitāny uta

text.ascii: bhavAn drakSyati yasmai ca bhavAn etat pradAsyati
text.ur: bhavān drakṣyati yasmai ca bhavān etat pradāsyati

text.ascii: tatheti rAmas tad vAri pratigRhyAtha satkRtam
text.ur: tatheti rāmas tad vāri pratigr̥hyātha satkr̥tam

text.ascii: cakAra netrayoH zaucaM lakSmaNaz ca mahAmanAH
text.ur: cakāra netrayoḥ śaucaṁ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāmanāḥ

text.ascii: sugrIvajAmbavantau ca hanUmAn aGgadas tathA
text.ur: sugrīvajāmbavantau ca hanūmān aṅgadas tathā

text.ascii: maindadvividanIlAz ca prAyaH plavagasattamAH
text.ur: maindadvividanīlāś ca prāyaḥ plavagasattamāḥ

text.ascii: tathA samabhavac cApi yad uvAca vibhISaNaH
text.ur: tathā samabhavac cāpi yad uvāca vibhīṣaṇaḥ

text.ascii: kSaNenAtIndriyANy eSAM cakSUMSy Asan yudhiSThira
text.ur: kṣaṇenātīndriyāṇy eṣāṁ cakṣūṁṣy āsan yudhiṣṭhira

text.ascii: indrajit kRtakarmA tu pitre karma tadAtmanaH
text.ur: indrajit kr̥takarmā tu pitre karma tadātmanaḥ

text.ascii: nivedya punar Agacchat tvarayAjiziraH prati
text.ur: nivedya punar āgacchat tvarayājiśiraḥ prati

text.ascii: tam ApatantaM saMkruddhaM punar eva yuyutsayA
text.ur: tam āpatantaṁ saṁkruddhaṁ punar eva yuyutsayā

text.ascii: abhidudrAva saumitrir vibhISaNamate sthitaH
text.ur: abhidudrāva saumitrir vibhīṣaṇamate sthitaḥ

text.ascii: akRtAhnikam evainaM jighAMsur jitakAzinam
text.ur: akr̥tāhnikam evainaṁ jighāṁsur jitakāśinam

text.ascii: zarair jaghAna saMkruddhaH kRtasaMjJo 'tha lakSmaNaH
text.ur: śarair jaghāna saṁkruddhaḥ kr̥tasaṁjño ’tha lakṣmaṇaḥ

text.ascii: tayoH samabhavad yuddhaM tadAnyonyaM jigISatoH
text.ur: tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṁ tadānyonyaṁ jigīṣatoḥ

text.ascii: atIva citram AzcaryaM zakraprahlAdayor iva
text.ur: atīva citram āścaryaṁ śakraprahlādayor iva

text.ascii: avidhyad indrajit tIkSNaiH saumitriM marmabhedibhiH
text.ur: avidhyad indrajit tīkṣṇaiḥ saumitriṁ marmabhedibhiḥ

text.ascii: saumitriz cAnalasparzair avidhyad rAvaNiM zaraiH
text.ur: saumitriś cānalasparśair avidhyad rāvaṇiṁ śaraiḥ

text.ascii: saumitrizarasaMsparzAd rAvaNiH krodhamUrchitaH
text.ur: saumitriśarasaṁsparśād rāvaṇiḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ

text.ascii: asRjal lakSmaNAyASTau zarAn AzIviSopamAn
text.ur: asr̥jal lakṣmaṇāyāṣṭau śarān āśīviṣopamān

text.ascii: tasyAsUn pAvakasparzaiH saumitriH patribhis tribhiH
text.ur: tasyāsūn pāvakasparśaiḥ saumitriḥ patribhis tribhiḥ

text.ascii: yathA niraharad vIras tan me nigadataH zRNu
text.ur: yathā niraharad vīras tan me nigadataḥ śr̥ṇu

text.ascii: ekenAsya dhanuSmantaM bAhuM dehAd apAtayat
text.ur: ekenāsya dhanuṣmantaṁ bāhuṁ dehād apātayat

text.ascii: dvitIyena sanArAcaM bhujaM bhUmau nyapAtayat
text.ur: dvitīyena sanārācaṁ bhujaṁ bhūmau nyapātayat

text.ascii: tRtIyena tu bANena pRthudhAreNa bhAsvatA
text.ur: tr̥tīyena tu bāṇena pr̥thudhāreṇa bhāsvatā

text.ascii: jahAra sunasaM cAru ziro bhrAjiSNukuNDalam
text.ur: jahāra sunasaṁ cāru śiro bhrājiṣṇukuṇḍalam

text.ascii: vinikRttabhujaskandhaM kabandhaM bhImadarzanam
text.ur: vinikr̥ttabhujaskandhaṁ kabandhaṁ bhīmadarśanam

text.ascii: taM hatvA sUtam apy astrair jaghAna balinAM varaH
text.ur: taṁ hatvā sūtam apy astrair jaghāna balināṁ varaḥ

text.ascii: laGkAM pravezayAm Asur vAjinas taM rathaM tadA
text.ur: laṅkāṁ praveśayām āsur vājinas taṁ rathaṁ tadā

text.ascii: dadarza rAvaNas taM ca rathaM putravinAkRtam
text.ur: dadarśa rāvaṇas taṁ ca rathaṁ putravinākr̥tam

text.ascii: sa putraM nihataM dRSTvA trAsAt saMbhrAntalocanaH
text.ur: sa putraṁ nihataṁ dr̥ṣṭvā trāsāt saṁbhrāntalocanaḥ

text.ascii: rAvaNaH zokamohArto vaidehIM hantum udyataH
text.ur: rāvaṇaḥ śokamohārto vaidehīṁ hantum udyataḥ

text.ascii: azokavanikAsthAM tAM rAmadarzanalAlasAm
text.ur: aśokavanikāsthāṁ tāṁ rāmadarśanalālasām

text.ascii: khaDgam AdAya duSTAtmA javenAbhipapAta ha
text.ur: khaḍgam ādāya duṣṭātmā javenābhipapāta ha

text.ascii: taM dRSTvA tasya durbuddher avindhyaH pApanizcayam
text.ur: taṁ dr̥ṣṭvā tasya durbuddher avindhyaḥ pāpaniścayam

text.ascii: zamayAm Asa saMkruddhaM zrUyatAM yena hetunA
text.ur: śamayām āsa saṁkruddhaṁ śrūyatāṁ yena hetunā

text.ascii: mahArAjye sthito dIpte na striyaM hantum arhasi
text.ud: महाराज्ये स्थितो दीप्ते न स्त्रियं हन्तुमर्हसि
text.ur: mahārājye sthito dīpte na striyaṁ hantum arhasi

text.ascii: hataivaiSA yadA strI ca bandhanasthA ca te gRhe
text.ud: हतैवैषा यदा स्त्री च बन्धनस्था च ते गृहे
text.ur: hataivaiṣā yadā strī ca bandhanasthā ca te gr̥he

text.ascii: na caiSA dehabhedena hatA syAd iti me matiH
text.ud: न चैषा देहभेदेन हता स्यादिति मे मतिः
text.ur: na caiṣā dehabhedena hatā syād iti me matiḥ

text.ascii: jahi bhartAram evAsyA hate tasmin hatA bhavet
text.ur: jahi bhartāram evāsyā hate tasmin hatā bhavet

text.ascii: na hi te vikrame tulyaH sAkSAd api zatakratuH
text.ud: न हि ते विक्रमे तुल्यः साक्षादपि शतक्रतुः
text.ur: na hi te vikrame tulyaḥ sākṣād api śatakratuḥ

text.ascii: asakRd dhi tvayA sendrAs trAsitAs tridazA yudhi
text.ur: asakr̥d dhi tvayā sendrās trāsitās tridaśā yudhi

text.ascii: evaM bahuvidhair vAkyair avindhyo rAvaNaM tadA
text.ur: evaṁ bahuvidhair vākyair avindhyo rāvaṇaṁ tadā

text.ascii: kruddhaM saMzamayAm Asa jagRhe ca sa tadvacaH
text.ud: क्रुद्धं संशमयामास जगृहे च स तद्वचः
text.ur: kruddhaṁ saṁśamayām āsa jagr̥he ca sa tadvacaḥ

text.ascii: niryANe sa matiM kRtvA nidhAyAsiM kSapAcaraH
text.ud: निर्याणे स मतिं कृत्वा निधायासिं क्षपाचरः
text.ur: niryāṇe sa matiṁ kr̥tvā nidhāyāsiṁ kṣapācaraḥ

text.ascii: AjJApayAm Asa tadA ratho me kalpyatAm iti
text.ur: ājñāpayām āsa tadā ratho me kalpyatām iti
